pull.title: tests: Disable Tor interaction
pull.body: This is unnecessary during the current tests (any test for Tor interaction can explicitly enable it) and interferes with the proxy test.

repo.name: bitcoin

events.message:
tests: Disable Tor interaction

This is unnecessary during the current tests (any test for Tor
interaction can explicitly enable it) and interferes with the proxy
test.
